TopicTitle: Looking for someone to help us make a Kerbal curriculum/tutorial for our space camp!

Articles.Content: HI, we are looking at using Kerbal for our STEM Space camp this summer and would love someone to help us come up with a curriculum/challenges/tutorial for 5 one hour classes!
Welcome to our forum.

Welcome to the forums @RobinS!

Challenges and tutorial heavily depend on the level of whoever they are designed for; in particular it depends of knowledge about orbital mechanics, flying a rocket (or a plane), and the game itself. If I have these infos, I can probably design one or two :)
